Package com.project.service

Interface VegItemsService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    VegItemsServiceImpl
    public interface VegItemsService
    This interface defines the methods that need to be implemented for carrying out basic operations for vegetarian items. Contains 5 methods to view, modify, delete and insert vegetarian items. The methods that are defined here are used to perform the operations by calling the DAO layer methods.
    Author:
    Harsh Sharma

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      int deleteVegItems​(int itemNo)
      Method to delete a particular VegItem by calling the respective DAO layer method.
      int deleteVegItemsByCount​(int counter, java.lang.String dietName)
      Method to delete more than one i.e., N(here counter) number of VegItem by calling the respective DAO layer method for a particular diet name.
      int insertVegItems​(VegItems vegItems)
      Method to insert the vegetarian item by calling the respective insertVegItems method of the DAO layer(VegItemsDao).
      java.util.ArrayList<VegItems> readVegItems​(java.lang.String dietName)
      Method to read or retrieve all the VegItems for a particular diet plan.
      int updateVegItems​(VegItems vegItems)
      Method to update a particular VegItem.

    • Method Detail

      • insertVegItems

        int insertVegItems​(VegItems vegItems)
            throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                   java.sql.SQLException
        Method to insert the vegetarian item by calling the respective insertVegItems method of the DAO layer(VegItemsDao). Takes a VegItems class object and returns an integer if the DAO layer method is called successfully or not.
        Parameters:
        vegItems - An object of VegItems class.
        Returns:
        int The result after calling the DAO method i.e., 1 or 0;
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - Thrown when the requested class is not found in the class path.
        java.sql.SQLException - Throws when an error occurs due to any wrong implementation of a SQL query or any database calls.

      • readVegItems

        java.util.ArrayList<VegItems> readVegItems​(java.lang.String dietName)
                                    throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                                           java.sql.SQLException
        Method to read or retrieve all the VegItems for a particular diet plan. All the vegetarian items corresponding to a particular diet name are fetched by calling the respective DAO layer method.
        Parameters:
        dietName - Holds the name of the diet plan whose VegItems are to be fetched.
        Returns:
        ArrayList A List of VegItems.
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - Thrown when the requested class is not found in the class path.
        java.sql.SQLException - Throws when an error occurs due to any wrong implementation of a SQL query or any database calls.

      • updateVegItems

        int updateVegItems​(VegItems vegItems)
            throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                   java.sql.SQLException
        Method to update a particular VegItem. It modifies the existing VegItem with new details/values. Takes in a VegItem as a parameter and returns a corresponding integer for success or failure of calling respective DAO layer method.
        Parameters:
        vegItems - A object of NonVegItems class.
        Returns:
        int The result i.e., 1 or 0 for success or failure respectively.
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - Thrown when the requested class is not found in the class path.
        java.sql.SQLException - Throws when an error occurs due to any wrong implementation of a SQL query or any database calls.

      • deleteVegItems

        int deleteVegItems​(int itemNo)
            throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                   java.sql.SQLException
        Method to delete a particular VegItem by calling the respective DAO layer method. The VegItem corresponding to particular item number is deleted. Thus this method takes in an integer that is the vegetarian item number and on success or failure of calling DAO layer method returns a respective integer number.
        Parameters:
        itemNo - Holds the vegetarian item number.
        Returns:
        int The result i.e., 1 or 0 for success or failure respectively.
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - Thrown when the requested class is not found in the class path.
        java.sql.SQLException - Throws when an error occurs due to any wrong implementation of a SQL query or any database calls.

      • deleteVegItemsByCount

        int deleteVegItemsByCount​(int counter,
                          java.lang.String dietName)
                   throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                          java.sql.SQLException
        Method to delete more than one i.e., N(here counter) number of VegItem by calling the respective DAO layer method for a particular diet name. Takes in the diet plan name and the number of VegItems to delete and on success or failure returns a respective integer number.
        Parameters:
        counter - Holds the number that denotes how many VegItems are to be deleted.
        dietName - Holds the name of the diet plan.
        Returns:
        int The result i.e., 1 or 0 for success or failure respectively.
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - Thrown when the requested class is not found in the class path.
        java.sql.SQLException - Throws when an error occurs due to any wrong implementation of a SQL query or any database calls.
